name: Soda Clicker (Cowcoolboyman)
description:
Welcome to Soda Clicker! Earn money by clicking a soda! Buy upgrades to get more money!

DOWNLOAD GUIDE

1. Click this text in order to open the google drive download.

2. Right-click "soda-clicker" and click Download.

3. Wait a bit for the ZIP to download.

4. When downloaded, look for the ZIP in File Explorer.

5. When found, extract the ZIP (i use 7-zip)

6. Go into the new folder which came out of the ZIP.

7. Inside the folder, scroll down until you find "soda-clicker" (not the folder, but inside that folder)

8. Click on the application.

9. Have fun!
